articles.title: Europe battles 'tridemic' of respiratory illnesses - Financial Times
articles.description: Winter surge in people catching flu, Covid-19 or RSV risks overwhelming hospitals
articles.content:
Europe is facing a tridemic that threatens to push health systems to the limit as a surge in flu cases is compounded by Covid-19 and other respiratory illnesses.
